text: Luther Archimède (born 17 September 1999) is a Guadeloupean footballer who plays as a forward for Syracuse University. ==Professional career== Archimède joined the Sochaux academy in 2016, coming from Istres. Archimède made his senior debut with Sochaux in a 1-0 Coupe de France loss to Lille OSC on 7 January 2019. ==International career== Archimède fepresented the Guadeloupe U20s at the 2018 CONCACAF U-20 Championship and finished as the third top scorer, with 6 goals in 5 games. He made his senior debut for the Guadeloupe national football team in a 1-0 loss to Martinique for 2019–20 CONCACAF Nations League qualifying on 23 March 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Les Abymes Category:Guadeloupean footballers Category:Guadeloupe international footballers Category:FC Sochaux-Montbéliard players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Association football forwards Category:Syracuse Orange men's soccer players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States
title: Luther Archimède
